entities.name: CampaignActivity
entities.description: Task performed, or to be performed, by a user for planning or running a campaign.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the activity.

attributes.name: actualEnd
attributes.description: Enter the date when the campaign activity was actually  completed.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the activity.

attributes.name: activityId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the campaign activity.

attributes.name: isBilled
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the campaign activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the activity.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the campaign activity, such as key talking points, objectives, or details about the target audience.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when activity was last modified.

attributes.name: activityTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of activity.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the campaign activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled campaign activities are read-only and can't be edited.

attributes.name: scheduledEnd
attributes.description: Enter the expected due date and time for the activity to be completed to provide details about the timing of the campaign activity.

attributes.name: scheduledDurationMinutes
attributes.description: Scheduled duration, specified in minutes, of the campaign activity.

attributes.name: actualDurationMinutes
attributes.description: Shows the value selected in the Duration field on the campaign activity. The duration is used to report the time spent on the activity.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the campaign activity's status.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user or team who owns the activity.

attributes.name: actualStart
attributes.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the campaign activity to determine if the campaign activity started on the scheduled time.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the activity was created.

attributes.name: priorityCode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: regardingObjectId
attributes.description: Choose the parent campaign so that the campaign activity costs reflect in the correct campaign for reporting.

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the campaign activity.

attributes.name: isWorkflowCreated
attributes.description: Information about whether the campaign activity is created by a workflow rule.

attributes.name: scheduledStart
attributes.description: Enter the expected start date and time for the activity to provide details about timing of the campaign activity.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of user who last modified the activity.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user that owns the activity.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: instanceTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of instance of a recurring series.

attributes.name: seriesId
attributes.description: Uniqueidentifier specifying the id of recurring series of an instance.

attributes.name: isRegularActivity
attributes.description: Information regarding whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the activitypointer.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the activitypointer.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team that owns the activity.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: leftVoiceMail
attributes.description: Left the voice mail

attributes.name: community
attributes.description: Shows how contact about the social activity originated, such as from Twitter or Facebook. This field is read-only.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: isMapiPrivate
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: exchangeWebLink
attributes.description: Shows the web link of Activity of type email.

attributes.name: exchangeItemId
attributes.description: The message id of activity which is returned from Exchange Server.

attributes.name: deliveryPriorityCode
attributes.description: Priority of delivery of the activity to the email server.

attributes.name: sentOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the activity was sent.

attributes.name: deliveryLastAttemptedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the delivery of the activity was last attempted.

attributes.name: senderMailboxId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the mailbox associated with the sender of the email message.

attributes.name: postponeActivityProcessingUntil
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the Process.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the Stage.

attributes.name: activityAdditionalParams
attributes.description: Additional information provided by the external application as JSON. For internal use only.

attributes.name: SLAId
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the case record.

attributes.name: SLAInvokedId
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onHoldTime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastOnHoldTime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: sortDate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

attributes.name: from
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: to
attributes.description: Person who is the receiver of the activity.

attributes.name: CC
attributes.description: Carbon-copy (cc) recipients of the activity.

attributes.name: BCC
attributes.description: Blind Carbon-copy (bcc) recipients of the activity.

attributes.name: requiredAttendees
attributes.description: List of required attendees for the activity.

attributes.name: optionalAttendees
attributes.description: List of optional attendees for the activity.

attributes.name: organizer
attributes.description: Person who organized the activity.

attributes.name: resources
attributes.description: Users or facility/equipment that are required for the activity.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: customers
attributes.description: Customer with which the activity is associated.

attributes.name: partners
attributes.description: Outsource vendor with which activity is associated.

attributes.name: actualCost
attributes.description: Type the actual cost of the campaign activity. The value entered is rolled up to the related campaign in the total cost calculations.

attributes.name: actualCostBase
attributes.description: Value of the Actual Cost in base currency.

attributes.name: budgetedCost
attributes.description: Type the allocated budget of the campaign activity for estimated versus actual cost reporting.

attributes.name: budgetedCostBase
attributes.description: Value of the Budget Allocated in base currency.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Type a category to identify the campaign activity type, such as new business development or customer retention, to tie the campaign activity to a business group or function.

attributes.name: channelTypeCode
attributes.description: Select how communications for this activity will be sent, such as phone, letter, fax, or email.

attributes.name: doNotSendOnOptOut
attributes.description: Select whether to override the opt-out settings on leads, contacts, and accounts for the members of the target marketing lists of the campaign activity. If No is selected, marketing materials will be sent to members who have opted out.

attributes.name: excludeIfContactedInXDays
attributes.description: Type the minimum number of days that must be passed before a marketing list member can be contacted in a campaign again. The campaign activity will not be applied to members contacted within the specified time period.

attributes.name: ignoreInactiveListMembers
attributes.description: Select whether inactive marketing list members will be excluded from the campaign activity distribution.

attributes.name: subcategory
attributes.description: Type a subcategory to identify the campaign activity type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

attributes.name: typeCode
attributes.description: Select the type of campaign activity to indicate the purpose of the activity.

attributes.name: serviceId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated service.
